name: Chundong Wang 0001
content: Toast Lab | To orchestrate architecture, system, and theory for computing Toast Lab To orchestrate architecture, system, and theory for computing Preferences Publications People Positions Welcome to the Toast Lab in ShanghaiTech University. In the Lab, we focus on designing and optimizing computer systems. More details about the Lab can be found here. A mirror website, i.e., https://toast-lab.sist.shanghaitech.edu.cn, has been set up for the Lab. Should you have any question or be interested to join us, please send an email to toast.lab <the-at-sign> outlook.com or Dr. Chundong Wang (cd_wang <the-at-sign> outlook.com).
